article_title: Former Judge Paul Wright running for Congress
article_text:
The candidate lives nearly 200 miles from the district

He has campaigned as a Christian and conservative

article_metadata.news-keywords: Paul Wright, NC12, 12th congressional district, Charlotte, North Carolina
article_metadata.description: No 12th Congressional District candidate lives farther from the district than Republican Paul Wright. The retired judge lives in Mount Olive, 180 miles east of Charlotte.
article_metadata.title: Former Judge Paul Wright running for Congress | The Charlotte Observer
